Name : Shruti Lokesh Mankar

Roll No. : SECOB232

Project Title :Temperature and Mask Scanning Lock

Objective : To provide smart lock for school, colleges & companies.

Problem statement : Temperature sensor and mask scanning device

Solution : A sensor used to sense the body temperature.If the temperature is in normal range then the person satisfies the first requirement. A person has necessarily wear the mask on the face.If it satisfies both the condition then only the smart lock will open. Image scanning system(Using image processing) should be there which will scan the face check whether the person has mask on their face or not.

Project Title :Smart Watch for Physically Disabled

Objective : To provide the balance alert on wheel chair

Problem statement : The Divyangjan's are not able to check that their balance are proper on wheel chair or not.

Solution : A wheelchair consist of balancing watch. This watch is going to provide the exact balance information that the person is sat on the one side so there is a chance to fall down from the wheelchair. If there is some risk found then the watch will give alert to the person.Please maintain your balance on that particular side. It will help the person to maintain balance on the wheelchair and travel safely without fear.
